titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Virginia Tech and Local History Mounted Clippings, c. 1870s-1960s
titlestmt.subtitle: Virginia Tech and Local History Mounted Clippings VerticalFile.006

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2020-01-13 10:32:40 -0500

change.item: Laurel Rozema added Mo56a-i, Association of Married Students, which was previously separated from the collection.
Laurel Rozema added Mv1-10, Veterans at VPI; added Mo5a, General notes on student organizations; added scope notes for references from RG subject index; and corrected typos.

titlepage.titleproper: Virginia Tech and Local History Mounted Clippings, c. 1870s-1960s
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections VerticalFile.006

defitem.label: Processed by: Ryan Mair, Student Worker, Laurel Rozema, Archivist, and Special Collections Staff,

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Virginia Tech and Local History Mounted Clippings, c. 1870s-1960s
did.abstract: In general, the Virginia Tech and Local History Mounted Clippings include newspaper clippings, photocopies, ephermera, unpublished and/or informal publications, and other papers relating to a specific subject area. Files in this collection relate to Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, and the activities of members of the community or university. The collection was primarily collected by library staff through the 1960s.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Virginia Tech and Local History Mounted Clippings must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: [Item-specific information], Virginia Tech and Local History Mounted Clippings, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Newman Library staff collected materials for mounted clippings through the 1960s.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description was completed by Special Collections staff prior to 2015. The finding aid was completed in August 2015. The re-integration of Mo56a-i, Association of Married Students was completed in October 2019.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: In general, the Virginia Tech and Local History Mounted Clippings include newspaper clippings, photocopies, ephermera, unpublished and/or informal publications, and other papers relating to a specific subject area. Files in this collection relate to Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, and the activities of members of the community or university.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Mounted Clippings are arranged by subject, primarily alphabetically.

list.head: Vertical Files (successors to the mounted clippings):
